about_the_game:
🗡️ Welcome to Hentai Castle 🏰

A journey that combines relaxation and challenge, available now for your wishlist!

🎮 Unique and Engaging Gameplay

Hentai Castle is a captivating combination of Suika-style gameplay and RPG elements, perfect for players seeking both casual fun and strategic challenges. Explore a world full of secrets, princesses, and mystical creatures, where each level brings a new experience.

Game Modes:

  • Standard Mode: Progressively challenging levels that test your skills.

  • Gallery: Unlock new beautyfull images of our characters.

🌟 Key Features:

  • Suika-style Gameplay — Simple and fun mechanics for all types of players.

  • RPG Elements — Level up your character, unlock abilities, and defeat powerful enemies.

  • Increasing Challenges — Progressively harder levels ensure an engaging learning curve.

  • Powerful Upgrades — Earn amazing upgrades to overcome obstacles and enemies.

  • One-Hand Play — Perfect for convenience; you can play using just a mouse!

content_descriptors.notes: The charactheres loses their clothes when you advance levels.

detailed_description:
🗡️ Welcome to Hentai Castle 🏰

A journey that combines relaxation and challenge, available now for your wishlist!

🎮 Unique and Engaging Gameplay

Hentai Castle is a captivating combination of Suika-style gameplay and RPG elements, perfect for players seeking both casual fun and strategic challenges. Explore a world full of secrets, princesses, and mystical creatures, where each level brings a new experience.

Game Modes:

  • Standard Mode: Progressively challenging levels that test your skills.

  • Gallery: Unlock new beautyfull images of our characters.

🌟 Key Features:

  • Suika-style Gameplay — Simple and fun mechanics for all types of players.

  • RPG Elements — Level up your character, unlock abilities, and defeat powerful enemies.

  • Increasing Challenges — Progressively harder levels ensure an engaging learning curve.

  • Powerful Upgrades — Earn amazing upgrades to overcome obstacles and enemies.

  • One-Hand Play — Perfect for convenience; you can play using just a mouse!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 (or equivalent SteamOS version)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 500 MB MB available space
  • Sound Card: OnBoard
  • VR Support: NO
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 (or latest SteamOS version)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 1 GB MB available space
  • Sound Card: OnBoard
  • VR Support: NO

name: Hentai Castle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Pentium 4 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OnBoard
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OnBoard
  • VR Support: NO
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OnBoard
  • VR Support: NO

short_description: A Suika-like RPG blend with endless and standard modes, offering relaxing yet challenging gameplay. Unlock levels, defeat castle inhabitants, and upgrade your abilities—all with just one hand and a mouse.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian, Japanese
